companyid.title: Company ID
companyid.description: Can be found under QuickBooks account's "Account and Setting".

endpoints.title: Endpoints
endpoints.description: Can be found under QuickBooks account's "Account and Setting".

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Valid types are: PrevMonthStart, PrevMonthEnd or a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.title: End date
end_date.description: Valid types are: PrevMonthStart, PrevMonthEnd or a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

output_table_name.title: Storage Table Name
output_table_name.description: Name of the table stored in Storage.

load_type.title: Load Type
load_type.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If incremental load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table. Tables with a primary key will have rows updated, tables without a primary key will have rows appended.

primary_keys.title: Primary Keys
primary_keys.description: List of primary keys separated by commas e.g. id, other_id. If a primary key is set, updates can be done on the table by selecting incremental loads. The primary key can consist of multiple columns. The primary key of an existing table cannot be changed.
